title: Set Up Delta Sharing
description: Fill in the blanks to create a Delta Share and share a table with an external recipient using Unity Catalog's Delta Sharing feature.
hints: Shares are containers for tables you want to share externally
ADD TABLE grants access to specific tables within a share
Recipients represent external parties who can access shares
explanation: Delta Sharing is an open protocol for secure data sharing. Shares are logical containers holding references to tables. Recipients represent external consumers who receive activation links to access shared data. This enables sharing data across organizations without copying - recipients query data in place with their own compute.
